update FUN_PROFIT set COMP_ID = #{compId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DEAL_ID = #{dealId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DEPT_ID = #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PROFIT_PROPORTION = #{profitProportion,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, PROFIT_MONEY = #{profitMoney,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, SETTLE_TIME = #{settleTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SETTLE_FLAG = #{settleFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AGREEMENT_NO = #{agreementNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DEAL_VERIFY_TIME = #{dealVerifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DEAL_TYPE = #{dealType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, AREA_ID = #{areaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, REG_ID = #{regId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PROFIT_DEAL_TYPE = #{profitDealType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, PERFORMANCE_ID = #{performanceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PERFORMANCE_NAME = #{performanceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GR_ID = #{grId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PROFIT_TYPE = #{profitType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, ARCHIVE_ID = #{archiveId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ROLE_ID = #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ROLE_NAME = #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEVELS_ID = #{levelsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, LEVELS_NAME = #{levelsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RECEIVABLE_MONEY = #{receivableMoney,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, PERFORMANCE_TYPE = #{performanceType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, DISCOUNT = #{discount,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, ASSESSMENT_MONTH = #{assessmentMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VALID_FLAG = #{validFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ORGANIZATION_PATH = #{organizationPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_1 = #{org1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ORG_2 = #{org2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ORG_3 = #{org3,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ORG_4 = #{org4,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ORG_5 = #{org5,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ORG_6 = #{org6,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ORG_7 = #{org7,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ORG_8 = #{org8,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ORG_9 = #{org9,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ORG_10 = #{org10,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ORG_11 = #{org11,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ORG_12 = #{org12,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ORG_13 = #{org13,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ORG_14 = #{org14,jdbcType=INTEGER} where PROFIT_ID = #{profitId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT next value for SEQ_FUN_PROFIT_PROFIT_ID
insert into FUN_PROFIT
PROFIT_ID,
COMP_ID,
DEAL_ID,
DEPT_ID,
USER_ID,
PROFIT_PROPORTION,
PROFIT_MONEY,
SETTLE_TIME,
SETTLE_FLAG,
REMARK,
AGREEMENT_NO,
CREATE_DATE,
DEAL_VERIFY_TIME,
DEAL_TYPE,
AREA_ID,
REG_ID,
PROFIT_DEAL_TYPE,
PERFORMANCE_ID,
PERFORMANCE_NAME,
GR_ID,
PROFIT_TYPE,
ARCHIVE_ID,
ROLE_ID,
ROLE_NAME,
LEVELS_ID,
LEVELS_NAME,
RECEIVABLE_MONEY,
PERFORMANCE_TYPE,
DISCOUNT,
ASSESSMENT_MONTH,
VALID_FLAG,
ORGANIZATION_PATH,
${dbFieldPath},
#{param.profitId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{param.compId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{param.dealId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{param.deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{param.userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{param.profitProportion,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
#{param.profitMoney,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
#{param.settleTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{param.settleFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{param.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{param.agreementNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{param.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{param.dealVerifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{param.dealType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{param.areaId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{param.regId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{param.profitDealType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{param.performanceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{param.performanceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{param.grId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{param.profitType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{param.archiveId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{param.roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{param.roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{param.levelsId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{param.levelsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{param.receivableMoney,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
#{param.performanceType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{param.discount,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
#{param.assessmentMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{param.validFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{param.organizationPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{orgIds},
mapper.select: select SUM (B.PROFIT_MONEY) as salaryTotal from FUN_PROFIT B left join FUN_DEAL C ON B.DEAL_ID = C.DEAL_ID AND C.COMP_ID = B.COMP_ID where B.COMP_ID= #{param.compId} and C.SIGN_DATE <= #{param.endTime} and C.SIGN_DATE >= #{param.startTime} and B.ARCHIVE_ID = #{param.archiveId}
select sum(PROFIT_MONEY) as REAL_MONEY from FUN_PROFIT WHERE DEAL_ID =#{dealId}
mapper.update: update FUN_PROFIT set VALID_FLAG = #{param.validFlag} where comp_id = #{compId} and PROFIT_ID in (${param.profitIds})
mapper.select:
SELECT
A.GR_ID A.USER_ID as RANGE_ID, SUM (A.${moneyCloumn}) PROFIT_MONEY FROM FUN_PROFIT A LEFT JOIN FUN_DEAL B ON A.DEAL_ID = B.DEAL_ID WHERE A.COMP_ID = #{compId} AND A.USER_ID IS NOT NULL AND B.SIGN_DATE >= #{startTime} AND
A.GR_ID A.USER_ID
IN
#{rangeId}
GROUP BY
A.GR_ID A.USER_ID

SELECT convert(VARCHAR(7),B.SIGN_DATE,20) AS dateCount,SUM(A.PROFIT_MONEY) as actualProfit,SUM(A.RECEIVABLE_MONEY) as receivableProfit FROM FUN_PROFIT A LEFT JOIN FUN_DEAL B ON A.DEAL_ID = B.DEAL_ID WHERE A.COMP_ID = #{param.compId} and
A.COMP_ID A.AREA_ID A.REG_ID A.DEPT_ID
IN
#{rangeId}
and B.SIGN_DATE >=#{param.startTime} and B.SIGN_DATE <=#{param.endTime} group by convert(VARCHAR(7),B.SIGN_DATE,20)

with t_profit as( select sum(a.${moneyCloumn}) as totalMoney,A.USER_ID as userId,a.COMP_ID as compId from FUN_PROFIT A LEFT JOIN FUN_DEAL B ON a.deal_id = B.deal_id where a.COMP_ID = #{compId} and b.SIGN_DATE >=#{startTime} GROUP BY A.USER_ID,a.COMP_ID ) select totalMoney,userId,compId,ROW_NUMBER() over(order by totalMoney DESC) as ranks from t_profit
mapper.update: UPDATE FUN_PROFIT SET SETTLE_TIME=#{settleTime},DEAL_VERIFY_TIME=#{dealVerifyTime},SETTLE_FLAG=#{settleFlag} WHERE DEAL_ID = #{dealId} AND COMP_ID = #{compId}

UPDATE FUN_PROFIT SET PROFIT_MONEY = (#{realPerformance}*PROFIT_PROPORTION/100), RECEIVABLE_MONEY = (#{needPerformance}*PROFIT_PROPORTION/100) WHERE DEAL_ID = #{dealId} and PERFORMANCE_TYPE = #{performanceType}
and USER_ID IS NULL

UPDATE FUN_PROFIT SET PROFIT_MONEY = (#{realPerformance}*PROFIT_PROPORTION/100), RECEIVABLE_MONEY = (#{needPerformance}*PROFIT_PROPORTION/100) WHERE DEAL_ID = #{dealId} and PERFORMANCE_TYPE = #{performanceType} and PROFIT_TYPE IN (0,2)
mapper.select: select count (1) from FUN_PROFIT where DEAL_ID = #{dealId} and SETTLE_FLAG = 2
mapper.update: update FUN_PROFIT set DEAL_VERIFY_TIME = #{dealVerifyTime},SETTLE_FLAG = #{settleFlagChecked} where COMP_ID = #{compId} and DEAL_ID = #{dealId}
update FUN_PROFIT set SETTLE_FLAG = 0 where ARCHIVE_ID=#{archiveId} and SETTLE_FLAG != 2 and COMP_ID = #{compId}
update FUN_PROFIT set PROFIT_TYPE = 2 where COMP_ID = #{compId} and PROFIT_TYPE = 0 and DEAL_ID = #{dealId} and USER_ID is null
update FUN_PROFIT set PROFIT_PROPORTION = PROFIT_PROPORTION * 2 where COMP_ID = #{compId} and PROFIT_TYPE = 0 and DEAL_ID = #{dealId} and USER_ID is NOT null

update FUN_PROFIT set USER_ID = null, AREA_ID = null, REG_ID = null, DEPT_ID = null, GR_ID = null, ROLE_ID = null, ROLE_NAME = null, ARCHIVE_ID = null where COMP_ID = #{compId} and DEAL_ID = #{dealId} and PROFIT_ID in
#{profitId}
mapper.delete: delete FROM FUN_PROFIT WHERE COMP_ID = #{compId} AND USER_ID = #{userId} AND PERFORMANCE_NAME LIKE '%%' AND PROFIT_ID NOT IN (SELECT PROFIT_ID FROM FUN_PROFIT_DETAIL WHERE COMP_ID = #{compId} AND USER_ID = #{userId})
